summary: A configuration container that holds every hyperparameter required to define and train a UniSpeechSat speech model, covering vocabulary size, transformer encoder dimensions, convolutional feature extractor architecture, quantization codebooks, data‑augmentation (SpecAugment), dropout settings, layer‑norm options, loss‑specific parameters (CTC, contrastive, diversity), and downstream classification head specifications.
business_intent: Offer a unified, reproducible way for developers to instantiate, customize, and share UniSpeechSat models for speech recognition, self‑supervised pre‑training, and downstream tasks such as classification, by centralizing all architectural and training settings in a single configurable object.
